name: Sherpx!
description:
You have to click on the green flag to start, I will fix this soon

In this Game, You Can Click to Shoot, Press Q and E to rotate, use the mouse to move Sherpx, and Press N to activate the hard Mode

You need to protect yourself from Zombies with a Gun, In this Game you can Find some zombies variations, you can find the normal ones, the faster ones, and the protected ones.

You Can Activate Hard/Nightmare Mode by pressing N, in this Mode, you won't find
the fasters, normal, and protected ones, only the nightmare variation.

The Fast and Nightmare Zombies get fasters or stronger as your score or the times that they spawned, which makes the game harder
